item.title: OpenAI’s Windsurf deal is off — and Windsurf’s CEO is going to Google
item.description: OpenAI’s deal to buy Windsurf is off, and Google will instead hire Windsurf CEO Varun Mohan, cofounder Douglas Chen, and some of Windsurf’s R&D employees and bring them onto the Google DeepMind te

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI’s deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it’s still a long ways off.
